publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5520 Tommy Sheridan: Cash for Honours: The Scottish Dimension—That the Parliament calls on the First Minister to make a full disclosure of any knowledge he has concerning the current cash for honours investigation and, in particular, asks him to disclose any knowledge of peerages being offered to MSPs as an inducement to them to retire and whether he is aware of any attempt to cover up correspondence on such subjects.

S2M-5520 Tommy Sheridan: Cash for Honours: The Scottish Dimension—That the Parliament calls on the First Minister to make a full disclosure of any knowledge he has concerning the current cash for honours investigation and, in particular, asks him to disclose any knowledge of peerages being offered to MSPs as an inducement to them to retire and whether he is aware of any attempt to cover up correspondence on such subjects.
